Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
girlfriend \girl"friend`\ n. 1. any female friend; as, Mary and her girlfriend organized the party. [WordNet sense 1] [WordNet 1.5]
2. a girl or young woman with whom a man is romantically involved; as, his girlfriend kicked him out. [WordNet sense 2]
Syn: girl, lady friend. [WordNet 1.5]

girlfriend n 1: any female friend; "Mary and her girlfriend organized the party" 2: a girl or young woman with whom a man is romantically involved; "his girlfriend kicked him out" [syn: {girl}, {lady friend}]
